pkgmetadata.longdescription: cycle-Free Flux balance analysis: Efficient removal of thermodynamically infeasible cycles from metabolic flux distributions // implement cycle-Free flux balance analysis, flux variability, and Random Sampling of solution space. Flux balance analysis is a technique to find fluxes in metabolic models at steady state. It is described in Orth, J.D., Thiele, I. and Palsson, B.O. What is flux balance analysis? Nat. Biotech. 28, 245-248 (2010).
